comment: / This twitter account will continue on , even in the face of the suspension of Marianne . But I will be changing rearranging a few things around here . Feel free to continue following me . I will be sharing Marianne s content still , but may identify myself on Twitter .
amr:
# ::snt / This twitter account will continue on , even in the face of the suspension of Marianne . But I will be changing rearranging a few things around here . Feel free to continue following me . I will be sharing Marianne s content still , but may identify myself on Twitter .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / continue-01
            :ARG1 (a / account
                  :medium (p / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Twitter"))
                  :mod (t / this))
            :concession (e / even-in-the-face
                  :poss (s / suspend-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Marianne")))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (c3 / change-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (r / rearrange-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                              :quant (f / few))
                        :location (a2 / around
                              :op1 (h / here)))))
      :snt3 (f2 / feel-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (f3 / free-04
                  :ARG1 y
                  :ARG3 (c4 / continue-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (f4 / follow-02
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 ii))))
      :snt4 (c5 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / share-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (c6 / content
                        :poss p2)
                  :mod (s3 / still))
            :ARG2 (p3 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / identify-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :medium p
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Twitter")))))

comment: / Marianne more than a person has and is still signifying somthing very important and very critical . She symbolises a new birth of political life . I will still be breathing into that life with my every action . I will not look away when things are tough .
amr:
# ::snt / Marianne more than a person has and is still signifying somthing very important and very critical . She symbolises a new birth of political life . I will still be breathing into that life with my every action . I will not look away when things are tough .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / have-quant-91
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Marianne"))
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more)
                  :ARG4 (p2 / person))
            :op2 (s / signify-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (t / thing)
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (ii / important-01
                              :degree (v / very))
                        :op2 (c / critical-02
                              :degree (v2 / very)))
                  :mod (s2 / still)))
      :snt2 (s3 / symbolize-01
            :ARG0 (s4 / she)
            :ARG1 (b / bear-02
                  :ARG1 (l / life
                        :mod (p3 / politics))
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / new-01)))
      :snt3 (b2 / breathe-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :destination (l2 / life
                  :mod (t2 / that))
            :time (s5 / still)
            :instrument (a3 / act-02
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :mod (e / every)))
      :snt4 (l3 / look-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 ii2
            :direction (a4 / away)
            :time (t3 / tough-02
                  :ARG1 (t4 / thing))))

comment: / for those of you who may not know . I was completely foreign to political engagement . I credit Marianne to inspiring me so much , to get involved to a degree that I now have myself a job at my local state assembly as an advisor . I had no experience prior and am fueled by love
amr:
